module.name: allinone_rewards
module.displayName: All-in-one Rewards : loyalty, multi levels sponsorship, affiliation, Facebook...
module.description: This module allows your customers to earn rewards while developing SEO and reputation of your shop: loyalty program, sponsorship program (multi-level, self-promotional),... In addition, the rewards are all grouped into a single account!
module.author: Prestaplugins
module.confirmUninstall: Do you really want to remove this module and all of its settings (customer's rewards and sponsorship won't be removed) ?
